#summary Opcodes for the data movement instructions

=== Data Movement Instructions ===
<wiki:toc/>

==== MOV ====
Template opcode:
{{{
0010 011110 1110 xxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx 010100
}}}
Instruction usage:
{{{
MOV Rxx, Rxx/c[0xa][0xb]/0xabcd;
}}}
If a hex number is used as the second operand, it cannot be longer than 20 bits.

----
==== LD ====
Template opcode:
{{{
1010 000100 1110 xxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx 000001
}}}
Instruction usage:
{{{
LD(.64/.128) Rxx, [Rxx+0xabcd];
}}}
----
==== ST ====
Template opcode:
{{{
1010 000100 1110 xxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx 001001
}}}
Instruction usage:
{{{
ST(.64/.128) Rxx, [Rxx+0xabcd];
}}}
